content: classic stripes in a full array of colors bring magic to play time with extra ease this simple pullover will fit over any outfit to add a lay of warmth and style the heathered rainbow pullover is a seamed drop-shoulder pullover worked from the bottom up in plain half_double_crochet the body features alternating stripes of a main color and several contrasting colors the bottom hem sleeves and neckline are trimmed with single_crochet ribbing
